items.title: Sargent made himself unavailable for Norwich cup win - Clement
items.summary: Philippe Clement says Josh Sargent will not be leaving Norwich in January, after claiming the striker made himself unavailable for Sunday's FA Cup tie with Walsall.

items.title: Magic Makama hat-trick as Norwich beat Walsall
items.summary: Twenty-one-year-old Jovon Makama scores a hat-trick as Norwich City beat Walsall in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Two for Reed as Mansfield upset Sheff Utd in thriller
items.summary: Mansfield Town cause one of the shocks of the FA Cup third round with a stunning victory over Sheffield United in a seven-goal thriller at Bramall Lane.

items.title: Chelsea kick off new year by thrashing West Ham
items.summary: Chelsea begin the new year with an impressive victory over West Ham in visiting manager Rita Guarino's first match in the Women's Super League.

items.title: Arsenal beat Portsmouth thanks to Martinelli hat-trick
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scores the first hat-trick of his senior career as an Arsenal side showing 10 changes come from a goal down to beat Championship side Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Man City beat Everton at home to strengthen grip on WSL title
items.summary: Manchester City consolidate their place at the top of the Women's Super League table with a convincing win over Everton.

items.title: Substitute Gordon, 43, produces save of season to keep Hearts beating
items.summary: Craig Gordon, 43 years young, having not played since Scotland's World Cup qualification heroics over Denmark, produces the save of the season to earn Hearts victory.

items.title: US Department of Commerce lifts planned crackdown on Chinese drones, including DJI â€” company gets reprieve ahead of Xi-Trump meeting in April, but the FCC ban still stands
items.summary: The U.S. Department of Commerce has retracted its proposal to stop the import of DJI drones, but the FCC's ban means that the U.S.'s doors are closed to new DJI models anyway.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury

items.title: AMD leaves the door open to experimental FSR Redstone support on RDNA 3

items.title: Motorola Signature and Razr Fold are official, Week 2 in review
items.summary: We'll start off the week 2 roundup with a phone that feels like a blast from the past - the Clicks Communicator. It has a 4.03-inch display (an AMOLED, luckily), Android 16 with a custom Niagara Launcher, one camera on the back, oh, and a physical QWERT keyboard. The phone weighs 170g and supports â€¦

items.title: McColgan reclaims European 10km record in Valencia
items.summary: Briton Eilish McColgan reclaims her women's European 10km record in Valencia in a time of 30 minutes seven seconds.

items.title: 'What a catch!' - Rams avoid play-off upset with 38 seconds remaining
items.summary: Colby Parkinson scores a touchdown with 38 seconds remaining as the Los Angeles Rams leave it late to beat the Carolina Panthers 34-31 to avoid a play-off upset.

items.title: Sabalenka beats Kostyuk to win third Brisbane title
items.summary: World number one Aryna Sabalenka prepares for the Australian Open with a 6-4 6-3 victory over Marta Kostyuk to win a third Brisbane International title.
